name: duo-cache
description: DuoCache is a module providing two level (in-memory and persistence) cache for saving resources like network connections, database quering, etc., meanwhile it keeps away the risks of loosing in-memory data(e.g. application reload) by utilizing a persistent storage.

scripts.compile: tsc --build tsconfig.esm5.json && tsc --build tsconfig.esm.json && tsc --build tsconfig.cjs.json

author: Robbie Liu <https://github.com/RobbieL-nlp>
